title: Reconnecting to champ select leads to these images after restarting computer fast
body:
1. get into ranked match
2. accidentally knock plug out of wall
3. connect back to champ select after restarting comp
4. Have error to reconnect.
-since image links didn't work here they are
http://imgur.com/DbgugHU
http://imgur.com/PzBKeQX

Continuing to try to reselect champ after clicking ok just reproduces champ select error. When select time ends it creates 2nd picture.
